welcome_message_body: Welcome to Horbury, a charming town known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our lovely city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves primarily low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves mainly charter and holiday flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
